message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.NE, cs.CL. 

The paper deals with the problem of catastrophic forgetting in artificial neural networks, which is a common issue in machine learning and specifically in deep learning. The paper proposes a new approach to sequential learning that leverages adversarial examples and combines it with the Elastic Weight Consolidation (EWC) method. This suggests that the paper is likely to belong to the sub-categories of machine learning (cs.LG), artificial intelligence (cs.AI), computer vision (cs.CV), neural and evolutionary computing (cs.NE), and computational linguistics (cs.CL).
